    public class ItemActivity
extends android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
    This activity handles viewing an item's details.

        Parameters:

      • editItem

        public void editItem(android.view.View view)
        Called when the user presses the "Pencil" icon in the Item Detail page.

        This method is used to send the user to the Edit Item page. It passes the item to be edited.

        Parameters:
        view - "Pencil" icon in Item Detail page

      • decodeImage

        public android.graphics.Bitmap decodeImage(java.lang.String encoded)
        Decodes the encoded string into an image and returns it. Code taken from: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/4837110/how-to-convert-a-base64-string-into-a-bitmap-image-to-show-it-in-a-imageview (C) 2011 user432209
        Parameters:
        encoded - encoded image in string format.
        Returns:
        decodedByte Bitmap of the decoded photo string

      • cloneItem

        public void cloneItem(android.view.View view)
        Called when the user presses the "Clone" button in the Item Detail page.

        This method is used to clone the friend's item and copy the item info into AddItemActivity.

        Parameters:
        view - "Clone" button

      • makeTrade

        public void makeTrade(android.view.View view)
        Called when the user presses the "Create Trade" button in the Item Detail page.

        This method is used to send the user to the Trade page.

        Parameters:
        view - "Create Trade" button
